title: Mural Watchface
summary: The most amazing photographs in your smartwatch
description: ★★ The most amazing photographs in your smartwatch provider by 500px service. ★★The first android wear watchface with multi screen to show more information, next agenda events, step counter, battery time remaining. Also you can call your favorite contacts directly from the smartwatch. View your recent calls on the smartwatch, etcWatch this video to multi screen feature:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v72qoDngNfg Displays carousel with your favorites photosAlso you will display your own photos in your smartwatchFind your phone easily, you will never forget where is your phone and quickly find it in one tap.Share your favorites watchfaces using whatsapp, facebook, email, etc .. with your friends, is really cool !!Forecast weather with with a minimalist designUnlock all features in a premiun version:[✔] No ads[✔] Enabled multi screen[✔] Enabled carousel photos[✔] Notifications telephone service[✔] 40 pictures to send a your smartwatch[✔] Save unlimited photographs as favorites[✔] Convert photographs to grayscale[✔] etc..Currently compatible android wear devices:- Moto 360- LG G Watch- LG G Watch R- LG Watch Urbane- Samsung Gear Live- Sony SmartWatch 3- ASUS ZenWatchAndroid Wear works with phones running Android 4.3 or higher. Visit http://g.co/WearCheck on your phone to see if it's compatible.You must update your smartwatch to Android 5.0 for use Mural Watchface 2.0 and aboveOfficial community:https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/111455299388853896293
descriptionHTML:
★★ The most amazing photographs in your smartwatch provider by 500px service. ★★



The first android wear watchface with multi screen to show more information, next agenda events, step counter, battery time remaining. Also you can call your favorite contacts directly from the smartwatch. View your recent calls on the smartwatch, etc



Watch this video to multi screen feature:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v72qoDngNfg



Displays carousel with your favorites photos



Also you will display your own photos in your smartwatch



Find your phone easily, you will never forget where is your phone and quickly find it in one tap.



Share your favorites watchfaces using whatsapp, facebook, email, etc .. with your friends, is really cool !!



Forecast weather with with a minimalist design



Unlock all features in a premiun version:
[✔] No ads
[✔] Enabled multi screen
[✔] Enabled carousel photos
[✔] Notifications telephone service
[✔] 40 pictures to send a your smartwatch
[✔] Save unlimited photographs as favorites
[✔] Convert photographs to grayscale
[✔] etc..



Currently compatible android wear devices:
- Moto 360
- LG G Watch
- LG G Watch R
- LG Watch Urbane
- Samsung Gear Live
- Sony SmartWatch 3
- ASUS ZenWatch



Android Wear works with phones running Android 4.3 or higher. Visit http://g.co/WearCheck on your phone to see if it's compatible.



You must update your smartwatch to Android 5.0 for use Mural Watchface 2.0 and above



Official community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/111455299388853896293
comments: Cj Jones Excellent watchface, easily the best in the Playstore. Only wish I could switch photos more frequently than 30 min, but that's a minor quibble. The find my phone feature doesn't seem to work on my 360/Note4 but that's not a big deal to me either.  *edit* Find my phone is working now.
Levy Rubbish not worth the money. Does not shuffle photos on the watch and can't change my favorite telephone numbers. Need refund!
Great Watch Face Options So far loving the app.   I purchased the Pro version, but at times the app doesn't recognize that.   Hopefully it'll correct itself with an update.

Great! I put in preferences that I do not want to see adult content, but I keep getting soft core porn pics available. I have changed the default category for the pictures, so this is no longer a problem. Thanks for answering, and for making a great app!

Excellent Liked it so much, this is the first time I've ever paid for a pro version of an app! Fast tech support. Very easy to add your own pics for the watch face. Love the one tap to bring up current appointments, steps and contacts.

Mural Pro has all the features I've been looking for in a great watchface. 1) Choose of colors on the ambient display. 2) Add your own photos and choose duration between switching. 3) Multiple screens for different item. 4) Many useful features in the apps options (setup). 5) Developer responds to questions very quickly. Look over the features in the Playstore description, it's a winner!!
recentChanges: - New multi screen feature, see tutorial on youtube
- Call your favorite contacts directly from the smartwatch
- View your recent calls on the smartwatch
- Fix errors and a lot of improvements
- Choose photos bettewen 18 categories by theme
- Fix errors and a lot of improvements﻿
